documents.document: Never trust people that put the milk in the tea while the tea bag is still in the cup. Cowboys.
Trainspotting 2 did not disappoint. Was sceptical about whether they could do the first one justice but they delivered 👏🏼 great film
Mike Dean should hang the whistle up. Shocking referee
Quinlan looking like he's ready to throw this
The Eubanks are world class dickheads.
#GenerationFd showing the repercussions of Fianna Fáils last spell in power. In other news FF top recent polls #Ireland 🙄
Good news everyone! I had a coffee and 2 scoops of pre workout and reclaimed the North on my way to the gym #UnitedIreland
Had one of those drink free weekends people go on about and I have to say it was absolute pony. Back on the pints next week 🍺
@DeanCreevey unreal. Just the 2 feet over 🙈
Referees in Spain are absolutely shocking. Ruined the game already #EspanyolSevillaFC
Kieran Tierney is a serious player ⚽️
About to watch my 5th game of the weekend with another 2 at least left. What a weekend ⚽️
Worst I've seen Barca play in ages. Betis well worth the lead
Short free kicks and short corners do my head in 😤
The gamesmanship in La Liga is difficult to watch at times. Dani Ceballos is an embarrassment 🙄
He's got a point you know. I still think the #MuslimBan is horrific however https://t.co/m0d18KnerS
This is a guy I want to represent me https://t.co/TTbskm7TXp
That #PLWorld special on Gary Speed was a serious tearjerker 😢 #Speedo
@RBhoop1724 drove by three on my way into town. Turning into America
The amount of Starbucks in Dublin actually makes me sick
I actually can't watch this #Inauguration 🙈
Gettin worried that Trump isn't going to announce this is all one big elaborate wind up 🙁this can't be real life #Inauguration
This is a tough watch #GenerationFd
Sticky Fingers - Gold Snafu (Live at the Enmore Theatre) Tune 🙌🏼 https://t.co/KRIO1bJTGk
Biscuit just broke off into my tea. Fuck this day anyway.
All nighter or set the alarm for 3am? 🤔 the big decison every fight night.
If festival season could come around quicker that would be ideal
@ShaunwGriff think you're right! Pass on the genius
@ShaunwGriff when am I not injured? Too old for this game
I should genuinely be sponsored by some sort of pharmaceutical company. Paracetamol coming out of my ears 🙄
Ankles swollen to bits, pulled my groin, glutes are burning and my back has seized up. I'm back! 😳🚑
It's a testament to the type of bloke Graham Taylor was that every football person on my timeline is expressing their sadness at his passing
First training session tonight in over 3 months 🏃🏻💨 fingers crossed my glass ankle holds up 🤞🏼
If Robbie Keane doesn't sign for Rovers I'm two footing @hoopermansrfc at the Bohs game
Prince not being on Spotify upsets me.
I'll fight any man, woman or child for a ticket to this https://t.co/1YkKGotvy6
Legitimately forgot it was Sunday because I haven't left my desk all weekend. https://t.co/d9V4DyQSnj
Plymouth Argyle fan. I bow to the majesty of your beard https://t.co/DBhzkDXaLt
Plymouth haven't laid a glove on Liverpool it's a bit pathetic. Training ground games are more competitive than this.
Commentator for Lincoln v Ipswich was brilliant 😂pure passion @BBCMOTD
Me when Young Americans comes on 👨🏼‍🎤 #DavidBowie #HappyBirthdayDavidBowie https://t.co/vxCssvBEfl
Christy Dignam looking brilliant on @rte #NationalTreasure #thetommytiernanshow @OfficialAslan
Diet postponed until after my exams. Working/studying is not conducive to a healthy diet.
Listening to Lowkey while studying was a bad idea. Put down my psychology notes to go organise a third intifada #freepalestine
First Monday of '17. Seen people on social media out training and eating salads. I however, have eaten like an abso… https://t.co/uxesL6WkIt
Spurs fans singing "Chelsea rent boys we're coming for you" Alright lads whatever you's are into 👀
2017 is the year I'll try and grow up. No promises though 👀
I'm going to have to settle down in 2017. These sessions are knocking the bollocks out of me 😫
Kolarov and Sterling in a competition to see who can kick the ball out of play the most. Kolarov slightly ahead at this stage
Football has changed over the last few years for the worse IMO. Runners & athletes being lauded, technical play almost being frowned upon 🙄
If Adama Traore could kick a ball he'd be a serious footballer
Lads we honestly haven't a hope with blokes like this around 😂 https://t.co/kW9tHTotIg
Celtic starting to turn the screw. Dembele the hunskelper
Serious 🎣 🎣🎣🎣😂 https://t.co/A1ulVG13TG
Remember when they tried to do a minute silence before Rovers v Bohs 🙄 was never going to work. Too many idiots, too much hatred.
Having a minute silence before this game is ludicrous 🙄#OldFirmDerby
One last session tonight then I'm off the gargle for a considerable period. I am absolutely wrecked.
I played Young Americans 43 times last night and I apologise for precisely none of them. What a tune
The idea of a Royal Family is insane when you think about it 😂
@downsey2010xxxx there is glitter everywhere and it's entirely your fault
Woke up covered head to toe in glitter. Must have been at a session in the Downes gaf
@OfficialAslan get better every time I see them. What a gig 🙌🏼
Chris Hughton is a bloke
What a squad https://t.co/bY8Lr7f7EE
The festive period has absolutely slapped me around. Body is in bits. Waving the white flag I'm done 😫
Late to the party but just saw @frankwarren_tv interview with @KuganCassius from a few days ago about the Eubanks. Absolute gold 👏🏼
Ah jaysus George Michael as well 😢
It's that time of year when I'm slightly hungover all the time. Only one cure for that 🍻
@James_Raff also, any opinion from a hard line republican should be discounted. Capitalist looneys
@James_Raff I dislike Obama as much as anyone. This cowboy is another level. Anyone that supports this man should be committed.
This is a real tweet from the PEOTUS. Mother of Christ. Down to the bunker 😳 https://t.co/EZy2lqH2I9
Galway away on a poxy Monday. Fuck off
Dundalk away, Bohs home the first two fixtures. Merry fucking Christmas is right ☘️ #KOH
Starting a petition to anoint "A Rainy Night in Soho" as the best song ever written. Magical
This is me https://t.co/WkPwqm8PKQ
I don't want to be overdramatic and say I have insomnia but I have a serious case of the "I can't fucking sleeps"
Took me about 45 minutes I was poxy freezing when I got in
I was gargled one day walking home from a session in the snow and stopped at every car on the way up the road and wrote SRFC on the window
Confirmed. What a fucking signing Ronan Finn is. Bring that league trophy home ☘️ @ShamrockRovers #Rovers2017
This pettiness nearly trumps their "won it in Tala" stunt 🙄 https://t.co/3hA8xDwntF
Not celebrating Ronan Finns signing until it's confirmed by the club...but imagine 👀☘️
Saw a segment on @SkySportsNewsHQ about an 81 y/o playing ball. I'm 25 and can't play a game without tearing something 😑 fair play to him 👏🏼
Iniestas touch 😍
3 days in a row on the gargle. Christmas is thumping me around and it's only started.
I'd like to add that he did in fact pick me up. Well done Paulie 👏🏼 https://t.co/HtsR6O3m8V
Rang the aul fella at 4 o'clock looking for a lift home from town. Afraid to leave my room in case I walk into a roundhouse kick to the head
And I've to go out tonight...and Saturday 😑
A day into the festivities and I'm struggling. This might be it. This might be the Christmas that kills me.
@noriordan I'm starting to worry that all these tweets aren't a wind up.
Rovers new goalkeeper played for a team called FC Santa Claus...🤔
Yessss mate 🙌🏼 @EPfestival https://t.co/FZtazs7aho
😂😂😂😂 wind up merchant https://t.co/f2unE0uMrG
I challenge you not to dance when Young Americans is played #groovy
Went to reverse out of the driveway this morning and couldn't understand why the car wasn't moving. Da was parked behind me #MondayMornings
Pet hate. Players kicking the ball out of play when another player is down even if the ref doesn't tell them to 🙄
Genuinely what was the point of that fight?
Tried to place a bet earlier. Mundo by KO, Taylor points, Whyte points, Joshua 4-6. Didn't go through. I'll be sick if it comes in 😫
Decent scrap this! Fair play to them #whytechisora
Whyte throws a spanner in the works with Jaws theme music AND Back in Black. Back to a 50/50 fight for me.
Chisora makes his ring walk to Hotel California. Immediately want him to win #SkyBoxing
